title: Silver Hits Record High as US-EU Crisis Over Greenland Simmers
description: Silver hit a record high and gold traded near an all-time peak as President Donald Trump’s push to take over Greenland fueled fears of a US-Europe trade war and kept markets on edge.
content: Silver hit a record high and gold traded near an all-time peak as President Donald Trump’s push to take over Greenland fueled fears of a US-Europe trade war and kept markets on edge.
